description.name: Yowpay - Peer to Peer SEPA Payments made easy
description.tagline: Accept Instant SEPA transfers directly on your account with automatic reconciliation.
description.long: Yowpay is the perfect alternate payment method for hosting businesses but not only.
features: No PSP between you and the client, it is peer to peer, Yowpay is only a gateway. Funds are settlement instantly
Easy integration with QRCODE instead of copying the bank information
Automatic reconciliation of incoming transfers on your account and flagging paid invoices likewise with card payments
